comments.html:
I found the following info on your website and I wonder if you still consider to update these webminars:

SDN-Related Technologies Winter 2024 Explore TCP, HTTP and QUIC Spring 2024 Explore Virtual Data Center Networking Infrastructure Spring 2024 Explore VMware NSX-T Update Spring 2024
comments.name: BOGDAN GOLAB

comments.html: Agree, I hope it become accessible again for one time fee or regular subscription whichever works
comments.name: Harpreet Singh

comments.html:
It's sad for me to see this part retiring. I've been always postponing this and then when I've finally decided to go somewhere along the direction of CCDE and thought of your Sub - it's no longer there :'(

Still, I'd like to ask you the same question: "Would it be possible to buy access to everything you did?". I understand that it won't be maintained in the foreseeable future (or ever), but I'm pretty sure there're folks (like me) who're fine paying a one-time fee for that (or donating to your favorite charity, or another option).
comments.name: Alexander

comments.html: This hits hard. I had a basic sub that lapse, then I was unemployed, finally when I had some $ to allocate to pro. development I read this.
comments.name: El
